channel.title: Colorado Hacking Laptop Aim Sprint Travel on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Colorado Hacking Laptop Aim Sprint Travel on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: heheh. i am dumb :(
item.description: so I am traveling to colorado, the colorful colorado mind you, and I brought my laptop. so I could watch DVDs and such whilst on the plane. However - I forgot to bring my goddamn dvd drive. it is sitting on my desk. suxor am i. I am not as happy about this proclamation. However, I did remember to bring cradle of filth… and my discman… so that is avail - if I want it.
